body: The term "ugly" bastard comes up a lot but damn this is the ugliest bastard I have ever seen. I found the art to be a bit hard to make out at times, everything tends to blend together just a bit too much. Perhaps more contrasting shades could help with that. The way the cum is drawn is pretty hot, it just has a certain feel that makes you think "yeah that's definitely something I'd want to be spurting down my throat." Her facial expressions were a tad too much at times, I think you have to have your characters relax so that the big moments of pain or pleasure really stand out, and people gotta take rests, even when getting raped, ya can't look so afraid all the time. Still, when her face hits it really hits. Some quality ahegao and I'll tell ya now that's hard to pull off even if it's only half the time. Pretty solid doujin, would be even better without the ugly bastard and his suckerfish lips. This gets a 5 from Matthew "super" DeLisi
